welcomepage_text2: Overcome yourself, generate personalized training plan. Get your body in desirable shape
welcomepage_text3: Welcome to our web application for sports preparation! We are pleased that you've chosen to utilize our platform for creating personalized training plans and recommended meal schedules. Whether you're a beginner or an advanced athlete, our application will assist you in achieving your goals and enhancing your sports performances. Get ready for your best performance and start your journey to success right here!
footertext1: This project is bachelor degree work. Provided information are based on relevant books and studies. Always prioritize your healts and safety when comitting to an activity. This project is not designed for people under 18 years old or pregnant women.
